snippet: Three of Davis Love III’s four captain’s picks to compete for the United States in the Ryder Cup, including the veteran Jim Furyk, struggled as Europe rallied and emerged victorious on Sunday.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column notes criticism United States team captain Davis Love III has taken for his controversial captain's picks at the 39th Ryder Cup.
lead_paragraph: Three of Davis Love III’s four captain’s picks to compete for the United States in the Ryder Cup, including the veteran Jim Furyk, struggled as Europe rallied and emerged victorious on Sunday.

headline.seo: Davis Love III, U.S. Ryder Cup Captain, Faces Criticism After Defeat
headline.main: After Cup Defeat, Scrutiny Over Captain’s Picks
headline.print_headline: Some Questionable Picks, Starting With the Captain
